name: Haunted House (itch) (Popsloth)
description:
You have been hired to exorcise all the spooky ghost from this house.

Step carefully and watch out or else it will be you who gets exorcise by the ghosts!

spooookyyyyy.

Instructions:

The game seems to only work in Google Chrome for some reason!

Move with WASD.

The lightswitches turns off and on the light and you can only see the ghosts when it is dark.

That is the only time the ghosts can hurt you also.

Grab the crosses to reverse your fortune adn choose those spooky spooks down!

The hitbox for exorcising ghosts is only the head not the cross (sorry didn't have time to fix!)
